segments.text: I notice the water overflowing, and it’s making me feel a little sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s making me uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it’s just gross how careless he’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just really unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it’s making me want to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever thought about the consequences of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up this mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just making me feel really uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how messy everything is.
segments.speaker: PAR
